name: Unstable Ecosystems
description:
Perhaps more of a simulation-program than a game, this little piece of software illustrates the life of simple creatures living together. Plants, herbivores and carnivores make up the food chain, fighting for survival. Watch how they interact in a symbiotic dance. Your role is simply to choose which new species will join the ecosystems.

Can you make it stable enough to have your species survive for generations?
